package.name: autoconf213
package.build: cd autoconf-${PKGVERSION} jobcount=2 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then DISTCC_HOSTS="$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" export DISTCC_HOSTS jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/autoconf213 && make -j $jobcount
package.install: cd autoconf-${PKGVERSION} make install ln -sf autoconf /usr/local/autoconf213/bin/autoconf-2.13 ln -sf /usr/local/autoconf213/bin/autoconf /usr/bin/autoconf-2.13
